name: project_short_name
description: Project name abbreviation, eg TCGA-LGG (there are 33 distinct tumor-type specific projects) (ISB-CGC added column)

name: case_barcode
description: Original TCGA case barcode, eg TCGA-12-1089 -- note that each case typically has a primary-tumor sample and a matched-normal (blood or adjacent tissue) sample; please refer to the TCGA Biospecimen table for more details (ISB-CGC added column)

name: sample_barcode
description: Original TCGA sample barcode, eg TCGA-12-1089-01A -- note that one sample may have multiple aliquots and therefore multiple sets of CN segmentations; so be sure to use GROUP BY appropriately in your queries (ISB-CGC added column)

name: aliquot_barcode
description: TCGA aliquot barcode, eg TCGA-12-1089-01A-01D-0517-0 (ISB-CGC added column)

name: chromosome
description: Chromosome for this CN segment (each row in this table correspond to one CN segment for one TCGA aliquot) -- there are 23 chromosomes: 1-22 and X

name: num_probes
description: Number of probes in the SNP array used to infer this CN segment

name: segment_mean
description: Mean CN value for this segment; the value is base2 log(CN/2), centered at 0
